DOC.brief_summary: A Study evaluate utility ProLung China Test adjunct CT scan diagnosis lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Utility ProLung China Test Diagnosis Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This Study assess stability ProLung China Test classification algorithm use adjunct CT scan . This Study assess whether potential safety concern ProLung China Test use evaluate patient positive CT scan lung cancer .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject male female , age 18 80 . 2 . Subject undergone CT scan lung ( ) indicate one nodules lesion . 3 . Subject 's pulmonary nodule lesion great 4mm small 50mm . Size determined large nodule lesion dimension identify CT image . 4 . Subject must able receive ProLung China Test within 30 day abnormal CT within 14 day prior tissue biopsy surgical resection . 1 . Subject implanted electronic device chest . Subject receive therapy suspect chest infection fungal infection tuberculosis . 2 . Subject diagnosed malignancy lung cancer 2 suspicious pulmonary nodule . 3 . Subject receive invasive medical surgical procedure within thoracic cavity within 30 day prior ProLung China Test within previous 14 day bronchoscopic procedure . 4 . Subject present anomalous physical anatomical condition precludes ProLung China Test measurement . 5 . Subject undergone unusually strenuous exercise within 24 hour . 6 . Subject significant systemic disease uncontrolled diabetes , advance heart failure , recent myocardial infarction , medical condition severe morbid obesity judgment Principal Investigator would make him/her unsuitable Study .
